Welcome to **IM-COOL-BOOY-FM**, a powerful Python-based radio station player. This tool is designed to allow users to easily search for, play, switch, and stop radio stations from around the world. Powered by the Radio Browser API and VLC Media Player, it provides a seamless and enjoyable listening experience with a modern, colorful CLI interface.ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’»
